definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: I can't wait to take a bite of the pumpernickel.
sentences.chinese: 我簡直迫不及待想喫一口黑包。

sentences.english: It was not easy to work in the shed;in winter it was a veritable ice-box.
sentences.chinese: 在這木棚裏工作可不輕鬆，冬天簡直是個冰箱。

sentences.english: The miraculous effect of medical herbs has raised some conservative eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 草藥的奇效簡直使一些思想保守的人瞠目結舌。

sentences.english: It is waste of time, admonishing you.
sentences.chinese: 勸告你簡直是浪費工夫。

sentences.english: The latest video games are simply stunning.
sentences.chinese: 最新的視頻遊戲簡直讓人難以置信。

sentences.english: Such sigh absolutly come from no excuse. such as suddenly thought of life and death.
sentences.chinese: 若干感慨，簡直無來由，比如忽然想到生死。

sentences.english: Example: Such a vicious lie could be nothing but a stab in the back.
sentences.chinese: 這種惡毒的謊言簡直是暗箭傷人。

sentences.english: Marianne hardly knew what to say.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗安簡直不知說什麼好。

sentences.english: It looks more a private club than a hotel lounge.
sentences.chinese: 那簡直就是一個高檔的私人商務會所。

sentences.english: He cumbered himself with an overcoat on a warm day.
sentences.chinese: 大熱天穿着件大衣簡直使他活受罪。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe that he would steal.
sentences.chinese: 我簡直無法相信他會偷東西。

sentences.english: At such an assembly as this, it would be insupportable.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的舞會上跳舞，簡直讓人受不了。

sentences.english: And now he's on the fast track to win a Nobel prize.
sentences.chinese: 現在他要得諾貝爾獎簡直探囊取物。

sentences.english: That humble Aiwowo, yet brings lasting relish on lips and teeth after eating.
sentences.chinese: 那不起眼的艾窩窩，喫完後簡直是脣齒留香。

sentences.english: I exclaimed in a rather triumphant tone.
sentences.chinese: 我叫着，簡直是一種勝利的腔調。

sentences.english: There"re so many demands on my time that I have very little leisure."
sentences.chinese: 有許多事要花時間去做，簡直沒有空暇。

definition: don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
